data.actual_result: When you collapse the category, the video icon turns into a voice icon.
data.expected_result: When you collapse them, the video icon should still be present, as it's still a screenshared voice channel.
data.short_description: When you collapse the category where a screenshare is being shared at, the video icon turns into Voice icon.
data.steps_to_repro: - In a screenshare-enabled server, have someone (or your alt) screensharing in one of the voice channels. It should have the video icon - Make sure you are not in the call, and collapse the category with that screenshared video channel. Observe.
